articles.title: Unexploded munitions found at first large US offshore wind farm sites
articles.description: Vineyard Wind and Revolution Wind are set to be some of the first commercial offshore wind farms in the US. However, seven unexploded munitions have just been discovered at the sites, which the developers will have to work around
articles.content:
By Matt Whittaker
The US currently only has small offshore windfarms, like this one near Rhode Island
Bloomberg Copyright: Bloomberg via Getty Images

articles.title: Stunning JWST image turns dust in a distant galaxy into a purple swirl
articles.description: A beautiful image of the spiral galaxy NGC 628, produced using data from the James Webb Space Telescope, may provide insights into how dust behaves in space
articles.content:
By Alex Wilkins

Gabriel Brammer / Janice Lee et al. and the PHANGS-JWST collaboration

articles.title: Heatwave is forcing some UK firms to turn off high-power computers

articles.title: Temperature hits 40°C on the UK's hottest day on record
articles.description: Heathrow Airport has provisionally recorded a temperature of 40.2°C, an event that would be extremely unlikely without climate change, and scientists warn that heatwaves will only get worse

A sign warning of severe heat on the M4 motorway in Rogiet, UK

articles.title: Sewage surveillance spots new covid-19 variants as effectively as PCRs

articles.title: A four-legged robot can learn to walk in an hour like a newborn foal
articles.description: A quadruped robot can learn how to walk by adjusting its gait after every stumble, mimicking the way animals learn how to move

articles.title: Beavers to be legally protected from harm in England from October
